product.name: Revlon PhotoReady Cream Blush
product.description:
Revlon PhotoReadyâ„¢ Cream Blush was 
created by Global Artistic Director Gucci Westman for the Spring 2012

healthy, gorgeous glow.Features: Creamy blush provides buildable, beautiful flush of colorLightweight formula with silky soft feel on skinBlends evenly over cheeks for smooth applicationPhotochromatic pigments bend and reflect light to provide cheeks with a beautiful glow
